author: Paramount Plus
description:
Trevor (Asher Grodman) and Bela (Punam Patel) can’t hide their feelings for each other, but with Trevor being a ghost, things are a bit complicated. Their wild plan? Have Trevor possess Eric’s (Andrew Leeds) body so he and Bela can finally be together. But before things go too far, Sam (Rose McIver) steps in to stop them. Season 2, Episode 9: The Christmas Spirit, Part One.

Stream Ghosts on Paramount+.
